description:
Two good sized pots for backcountry cooking. Everything nests together with extra room for your mugs and plates, to save room in your pack. The Fusion ceramic coating is safe at high temperature, and PTFE- and PFOA-free.

  • Durable ceramic non-stick is easy to clean and reduces the need for oil and butter
  • Includes 2 non-stick aluminum pots (1.5 and 2.5L)
  • Lid with an integrated strainer fits either pot
  • Insulated Talon™ pot handle attaches easily
  • Talon pot handle holds nested set together
name: MSR Ceramic 2-Pot set 2.0
